items.sentence: I think that maybe I won\'t be able to make myself understood in English.
I\'m fairly certain that Tom can understand French, but I could be wrong.
A long time ago when Pluto was still a planet, there was a boy named Tom.
Every time cigarettes go up in price, many people try to give up smoking.
How many times do I have to tell you not to eat candy just before dinner?
I\'m going to teach one of Tom\'s advanced classes while he\'s in Boston.
If we\'d followed Tom\'s advice, we wouldn\'t be having this problem now.
The fact that he did not accept any money shows that he is an honest man.
I was going to write to you, but I started doing other things and forgot.
Tom and Mary are having a house-warming party this coming Friday evening.
